name: VR Basketball Hoops
description:
Virtual Reality has made playing basketball more interesting, easy, and fun. Take it to the hoop and play the best Virtual Reality basketball game! , complete against the clock to get as many points as you can and try to beat the high score with ultra-realistic graphics and physics.

In our VR Basketball Hoops game, you can try shoot hoops with different types of balls not only with the basketballs.

Install now and shoot some hoops!
FEATURES
• Stunning Virtual Reality 3d Graphics
• Multiple game modes
• Play without internet or WiFi
• Addictive infinite Game Play
• Arcade mode, Time Limit mode, and Dynamic Hoops Mode
